column3: News;Battambang:------ According to  the Ministry of Water Resources and Meteorology
column4: heavy rain fell on Battambang from 5 pm to 8 pm on September 24
column6: The 52.8 mm  caused some areas in the city to be flooded. Other districts such as Thmor Kol
column9: and Maung Russey district were also affected.------https://postnews.com.kh/local/373601
